sentences.en: But for his soulful singing, but no response.
sentences.cn: 但对于他深情的歌唱, 却毫无反应.

sentences.en: He has a deep, commanding , powerhouse voice that is both ahusky and yet soulful, too.
sentences.cn: 他拥有一副深沉有力 、 充满爆发力的嗓音, 声音略带沙哑却不失情深.

sentences.en: He looked up with those great soulful eyes .
sentences.cn: 他抬头望着，眼神非常忧郁。

sentences.en: I thought she got a lovely voice, very soulful and melancholy.
sentences.cn: 我觉得她的嗓音可爱, 非常深情和忧郁.

sentences.en: My dog a soulful look when I scolded her.
sentences.cn: 我骂小狗时,它用充满感情的眼神看着我.

sentences.en: One short song the young lady played in a most soulful and tender mood.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉听到从敞着门的楼下客厅里传出了这支歌.
她有一双深情款款的大眼睛.

sentences.en: Soulful listening is a powerful way to let others know they are valued and cared about.
sentences.cn: 倾注灵魂的倾听是最有影响力的沟通,他知道自己正受到珍爱和关怀.

sentences.en: These are the cute children make so soulful and feelingful musics.
sentences.cn: 这些就是制造出这么多感人动人音乐的可爱的孩子们.
只留下虚弱而深情的哭泣?

sentences.en: What would I give for a soulful friend!
sentences.cn: 我拿什么给我的灵魂之交?

words.tran_cn: 没有灵魂的；没有精神的；卑鄙的；无情的
充满感情地；感情深切地；过于激动地
感情上的；高尚的；充满精神的

trans.tran_cn: 充满深情的，感情上的，高尚的
